lines.text: A nice young couple like yourself, you've no business in this business. If you'd seen your great uncle what it did for him in the end! That old battle-ax Mrs. Fazackalee! I remember when she was a wee slip of a thing, pretty as a picture - a "B" picture, mind yuh!

[Reacting to seeing the inside of the theater and its employees for the first time]
Flea pit? More like "The Snake Pit!"
